communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

All documents concerning reports of residency fraud involving the family of Melinda and Jestin Squires and addresses 16178 E. Franklin Rd Ewing, IL and 14425 Rescue Church Rd, Whittingon, IL.

Documents pertaining to the request for redistricting of 16178 E. Franklin Rd Ewing, IL.

Documentation of policy for investigating reports of residency fraud.

Document showing number of fraud claims made annually and if possible broken down by adjudication status.

Records are of public interest to determine how reports of violation of residency laws are applied and enforced and whether there is equal application of the law.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Chris Webster

title: Report of suspected tax fraud documents

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

All documents concerning the report of possible tax fraud made pertaining to property located at 16178 E. Franklin Rd Ewing, IL and individuals Melinda and Jestin Squires. The reports are believed to have been made between January and December 2024.

Documents showing number of suspected tax fraud reports made annually and number found substantiated. (To determine if Jefferson County has ever found a tax fraud case).

Records are of public interest to determine how reports of violation of tax laws are applied and enforced and whether there is equal application of the law.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Chris Webster

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

All documents including internal and external emails and text messages concerning reports of residency fraud involving the family of Melinda and Jestin Squires and addresses 16178 E. Franklin Rd Ewing, IL and 14425 Rescue Church Rd, Whittingon, IL.

Documents pertaining to total number of complaints of suspected residency fraud made to Benton Consolidated High School, number investigated, and adjudication status for school year 2024-2025.

Documentation of BCHS policy for investigating reports of residency fraud.

Records are of public interest to determine how reports of violation of residency laws are applied and enforced and whether there is equal application of the law with regard to public position, status, and relationship to board members.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Chris Webster

title: Property tax fraud ICO 16178 E. Franklin Rd, Ewing

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Property tax fraud ICO 16178 E. Franklin Rd, Ewing
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

All documents and investigative reports concerning report of possible tax fraud pertaining to property located at 16178 E. Franklin Rd Ewing, IL and individuals Melinda and Jestin Squires. The report is believed to have been made between October and December 2024 and closed with no charges made.

Records are of public interest to determine how reports of violation of tax laws are applied and enforced and whether there is equal application of the law.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Chris Webster
